item.title: 1047. Remove All Adjacent Duplicates In String
item.author: Author
item.description: Description Given a string s containing only lowercase letters, continuously remove adjacent characters that are the same and return the result. Test cases Example 1 Input: s = "abbcccccaa" Output: "ca" Example 2 Input: s = "abccba" Output: "" Example 3 Input: s = "mbccbefddfe" Output: "m" Solution We start with a result stack, go through all the characters in the string S one by one.
